00071 public:

00073   virtual ~Box () { };

00079   virtual unsigned getNumBalls () { return balls.size (); }
00080 
00081   virtual unsigned getDimension () { return D; }
00082   
00083   virtual void setXCam (const double &_Xcam) {
00084     for (int i = 0; i < D; Xcam[i++] = -_Xcam);
00085   }
00086   virtual double *getXCam () { return Xcam; }

00111 template <unsigned D> void Box<D>::rotate (Vec<D> vtrans[1<<D]) {
00112   for (unsigned i = 1; i < D; i++)
00113     for (unsigned j = 0; j < i; j++) 
00114       rot[i-1][j] = drot[i-1][j]*t;
00115   
00116   if (D > 3) R = matrix<D> ();
00117   for (unsigned i = 3; i < D; i++)
00118     for (unsigned j = 0; j < i; j++) {
00119       rot[i-1][j] = drot[i-1][j]*t;
00120       R = R*matrix<D> (j, i, rot[i-1][j]);
00121     }
00122 }
00123 
00124 template <unsigned D> Box<D>::Box (unsigned n):
00125     BoxBase (),
00126     Xmin (), Xmax (),
00127     balls () {
00128   for (int i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00129     Xmin[i]= -1.; Xmax[i] = 1.;
00130   }
00131   
00132   DefineHypercube ();
00133   DrawHypercube (D, vertices);
00134   
00135   setNumBalls (n);
00136 }
00137 
00138 template <unsigned D> Ball<D> *Box<D>::makeBall () {
00139   Ball<D> *tmp = new Ball<D>;
00140   bool touched = true; 
00141   while (touched) {
00142     touched = false;
00143     for (int j = 0; j < balls.size (); j++)
00144       if (touch (*balls[j], *tmp, tmp->r)) 
00145     touched = true;
00146       
00147     if (touched) {
00148       delete tmp; tmp = new Ball<D>; }
00149   }
00150   return tmp;
00151 }
00152 
00153 template <unsigned D> void Box<D>::addBall () {
00154   Ball<D> *tmp = makeBall ();
00155   balls.push_back (tmp);
00156 }
00157 
00158 template <unsigned D> void Box<D>::deleteBall () {
00159   if (balls[balls.size ()]) {
00160     delete balls[balls.size ()];
00161     balls[balls.size ()] = 0;
00162   }
00163   balls.pop_back ();
00164   //  cerr << "D " << balls.size ()<< " ";
00165 }
00166 
00167 template <unsigned D> void Box<D>::setNumBalls (unsigned newnum) {
00168   //  cerr << "S<"<<D<<">: " << balls.size ()<< " -> " << newnum << " ";
00169   if (newnum > balls.size ())
00170     for (int i = balls.size (); i < newnum; i++)
00171       addBall ();
00172   else if (newnum < balls.size ())
00173     for (int i = balls.size (); i > newnum; i--)
00174       deleteBall ();
00175   else { /* nothing to be done */ }
00176 }
00177 
00178 
00179 template <unsigned D> 
00180   void Box<D>::collide (Vec<D> &v1, Vec<D> &v2, 
00181             Vec<D> &dx,
00182             const double &m1, const double &m2) {
00183   if ((v1-v2).sqnorm() == 0) return;
00184 
00185   Vec<D> dxunity = dx.normalize ();
00186   double cosa1 = dxunity*v1, cosa2 = dxunity*v2;
00187   Vec<D> v1rad = dxunity*cosa1, v2rad = dxunity*cosa2,
00188                  v1tan = v1 - v1rad, v2tan = v2 - v2rad,
00189                  vcm = (v1rad*m1+v2rad*m2)/(m1+m2),
00190                  p1rad = (v1rad-vcm)*m1,
00191                  v1rad_ = vcm - p1rad/m1*elasticity, 
00192                  v2rad_ = vcm + p1rad/m2*elasticity;
00193   v1 = v1rad_+v1tan;
00194   v2 = v2rad_+v2tan;
00195 }
00196 
00197 template <unsigned D> void Box<D>::step (const double &dt) {
00198   t += dt; if (t >= max_t) {
00199     cout << num_collisions<< endl;
00200     exit (0);
00201   }
00202 
00203   //  cerr << balls.size () << endl;  
00204   for (int i = 0; i < balls.size(); i++) {
00205 
00206     for (int j = i+1; j < balls.size(); j++) 
00207       if (touch (*balls[i], *balls[j])) {
00208 
00209     double &m1 = balls[i]->m, &m2 = balls[j]->m;
00210     Vec<D> &v1 = balls[i]->v, &v2 = balls[j]->v;
00211     if (!sloppy) {
00212       Vec<D> dx = balls[i]->x - balls[j]->x;
00213       collide (v1, v2, dx, m1, m2);
00214     }
00215     else {
00216       Vec<D> vcm = (v1*m1+v2*m2)/(m1+m2),
00217              p1 = (v1-vcm)*m1;  //  = p2 =(v2rad-vcm)*m2,
00218       v1 = vcm - p1*elasticity/m1, v2 = vcm + p1*elasticity/m2; // - p2/m2;
00219     }
00220 
00221     balls[i]->step (dt); balls[j]->step (dt);
00222     num_collisions++;
00223       }
00224 
00225     for (int k = 0; k < D; k++) {
00226       if (balls[i]->x[k] <= Xmin[k]+balls[i]->r) {
00227     balls[i]->x[k] = Xmin[k]+balls[i]->r;
00228     balls[i]->v[k] = -balls[i]->v[k]*(1-friction);
00229       }
00230       if (balls[i]->x[k] >= Xmax[k]-balls[i]->r) {
00231     balls[i]->x[k] = Xmax[k]-balls[i]->r;
00232     balls[i]->v[k] = -balls[i]->v[k]*(1-friction);
00233       }
00234     }
00235 
00236     if (gravity) balls[i]->v[1] -= gravity*dt;
00237     balls[i]->step(dt);
00238   }
00239 }
00240 
00241 template <unsigned D>
00242   Vec<D> Box<D>::project (unsigned d,
00243                   const Vec<D> &X, const double &r,
00244                   Vec<D> &Xproj, double &rproj) {
00245   if (d > 3) {
00246     Vec<D> Xtrans = R*X; 
00247     double projectionfactor = -Xcam[d-1]/(Xtrans[d-1]-Xcam[d-1]);
00248 
00249     for (int i = 0; i < d-1; i++)
00250       Xproj[i]=Xtrans[i]*projectionfactor;
00251     rproj = r*projectionfactor;
00252 
00253     Xproj[d-1] = rproj; //  pack radius into the unused component, just in case
00254 
00255     return project (d-1, Xproj, rproj, Xproj, rproj);
00256   }
00257   else return X;
00258 }

00260 
00261 //  DefineHypercube ()
00262 //  creates an array of vectors which contain the edges of a hypercube of
00263 //  dimension num_dimensions in an ordered way
00264 template <unsigned D> void Box<D>::DefineHypercube () {
00265   for (unsigned i = 0; i < 1<<D; i++)
00266     for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)
00267       vertices[i][j] = i&(1<<j)? 1.0: -1.0;
00268 }

00271 #include <GL/gl.h>
00272 
00273 template <unsigned D> void Box<D>::draw () {
00274   glPushMatrix();
00275   glTranslatef( 0.,0.,0. );
00276   glScalef( 1.,1.,1. );
00277   glMaterial (1.0,0.9,1.0);    
00278   //  glLineWidth( 2.0 );
00279 
00280   if (D < 4) 
00281     DrawHypercube (D, vertices);
00282   else {    
00283     rotate (vtrans);
00284     static double dummy;
00285     for (unsigned i = 0; i < (1 << D); i++)
00286       project (D, vertices[i], 1., vtrans[i], dummy);
00287     DrawHypercube (D, vtrans);
00288   }
00289 
00290   glPopMatrix();
00291 
00292   for (int i = 0; i < balls.size(); i++) {
00293     balls[i]->draw();
00294   }
00295 }
